title: Bug 137142Type in chart interactivity doesn't work.
description: Bug 137142Type in chart interactivity doesn't work. Description:Type in chart interactivity doesn't work.Steps to reproduce1.
EB: Preview.Expected result:When click mouse, tooltip shows.Actual result:When mouse moved over, tooltip showed.
SR: Insert a chart.2. Set Title interactivity or other interactivity, set type to Mouse click, set Action Show Tooltip.3.
